attributes.action: keep " god " out of our primary schools
attributes.additional_details: i was appalled to hear a minister had visited my 5 year olds class to talk about god and jesus. this is false hope and wishful thinking as theres no facts are evidence to back it up. this man with a false title has no right to tell my child lies, and i shoudnt have to agree with them so my child doesnt get confused. he has his sermons on a sunday for his teachings and it up to the parents to bring their children there if thats what they believe.
